series.title: Game of Thrones
series.overview: Game of Thrones is an HBO series that tells the story of a medieval country's civil war. ... When the story begins, a decade-long summer is ending, and winter looms as characters battle to claim the "Iron Throne," the seat of the king of the Seven Kingdoms, the regime that rules all but the northern tip of Westeros.
series.stars: Sean Bean, Jim Broadbent, Mark Addy

series.title: Imperfect the Series
series.overview: This series takes place a year before the film Imperfect. At that time Dika had not yet met Rara, and was working on a photography project outside the city. The common thread of conflict is in Neti's love story.
series.stars: Kiky Saputri, Aci Resti, Neneng Wulandari

series.title: Kingdom
series.overview: In this period zombie thriller, a Korean prince is sent out on a mission to investigate an outbreak that threatens his kingdom.
series.stars: Ji-Hoon Ju, Doona Bae, Ryu Seung-ryong

series.title: My Lecture, My Husband
series.overview: Inggit's life is changed when her father is sick and sets her up with Mr. Arya, the most hated lecturer at her campus, and ask Inggit to marry him.
series.stars: Reza Rahadian, Prilly Latuconsina, Kevin Ardillova

series.title: Money Heist (La Casa De Papel)
series.overview: An enigmatic character called The Professor plans something unique when he plots to carry out the biggest robbery in history.
series.stars: Álvaro Morte, Úrsula Corberó, Pedro Alonso

series.title: The Queen's Gambit
series.overview: Based on the novel by Walter Tevis, the Netflix limited series drama The Queen's Gambit is a coming-of-age story that explores the true cost of genius. Abandoned and entrusted to a Kentucky orphanage in the late 1950s, a young Beth Harmon (Anya Taylor-Joy) discovers an astonishing talent for chess while developing an addiction to tranquilizers provided by the state as a sedative for the children.
series.stars: Anya Taylor-Joy, Marielle Heller, Thomas Brodie-Sangster

series.title: Start-Up
series.overview: Young entrepreneurs aspiring to launch virtual dreams into reality compete for success and love in the cutthroat world of Korea's high-tech industry.
series.stars: Bae Suzy, Nam Joo-Hyuk, Kim Seon-Ho

series.title: Stranger Things
series.overview: A love letter to the '80s classics that captivated a generation, Stranger Things is set in 1983 Indiana, where a young boy vanishes into thin air. As friends, family and local police search for answers, they are drawn into an extraordinary mystery involving top-secret government experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one very strange little girl.
series.stars: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Millie Bobby Brown
series.genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller

series.title: The End of the F***ing World
series.overview: James is 17 and is pretty sure he is a psychopath. Alyssa, also 17, is the cool and moody new girl at school. The pair make a connection and she persuades him to embark on a road trip in search of her real father.
series.stars: Jessica Barden, Alex Lawther, Steve Oram
series.genre: Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Romance, Thriller

series.title: The Umbrella Academy
series.overview: On the same day in 1989, forty-three infants are inexplicably born to random, unconnected women who showed no signs of pregnancy the day before. Seven are adopted by Sir Reginald Hargreeves, a billionaire industrialist, who creates The Umbrella Academy and prepares his "children" to save the world. But not everything went according to plan. In their teenage years, the family fractured and the team disbanded. Now, the six surviving thirty-something members reunite upon the news of Hargreeve's passing. Luther, Diego, Allison, Klaus, Vanya and Number Five work together to solve a mystery surrounding their father's death.
series.stars: Tom Hopper, Emmy Raver-Lampman, Eden Cupid
series.genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
series.production: Dark Horse Entertainment, Netflix, Universal Cable Productions
